articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Malta 
   Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's famous work "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction" was brought out in booklet by a publishing house of Malta on Oct. 7.
 The work, published on June 19, Juche 86 (1997), clarifies the idea that it is a basic principle to be observed in the efforts to accomplish the cause of socialism to preserve the Juche character and national character in the revolution and construction and the tasks and ways to do so.

Master's Degree of DPRK Awarded to Chinese Teacher
articles.content:
Master's Degree of DPRK Awarded to Chinese Teacher
   Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- A degree of Master of Linguistics of the DPRK was awarded to a teacher of Heilongjiang University in China.
 An awarding ceremony took place at the People's Palace of Culture Saturday.    
 A decree of the State Commission for Conferring Degrees and Titles of the DPRK was read out before conferring the degree to Ning Wei, a teacher of the school for oriental linguistic studies of Heilongjiang University in China, who contributed to the researches into combining forms of Korean grammatical particles and their characteristics during the period of her practice at Kim Il Sung University.
